0.00 | population_density_km2 = 833.01 }} Demographics (2020)2020 United States Census Data White Black Hispanic Asian 7.1% 72.2% 17.3% 0.9% Islander Native Other Mixed 0.0% 0.1% 0.3% 2.2% Markham is a city in Illinois in the United States. It is in Cook County. The population was 11,661 at the 2020 census. == References == Category:Cities in Illinois Category:Suburbs of Chicago Category:Settlements in Cook County, Illinois
